page.title: 11Links with the Past
page.content: In 1959 my dad{Edwin Watts,}then aged 10,was helping builders make a path at the back of his school at Newton Toney.His spade hit something hard.He dug around and lifted up a bone_a human bone!Workmen continued to dig and unearthed the complete skeleton of a saxon man. When I visited Newton Toney school in {1985}the head,Mr Marshman showed me a scrap book with news paper cuttings about my dad,which said "Edwin age 10, found a skeleton of a saxon man" The paper showed a photograph of the whole school with my dad, Eddie holding the skeleton over the trench where it was found.
